'''Multi-Arched Mondstadt Building''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Multi-Arched Mondstadt Building is obtainable from [[Tubby]] for reaching [[Trust Rank]] 1.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fir Wood = 12
|Birch Wood = 6
|sort = Fir Wood,Birch Wood
}}
